sentences.en: Being tall can make you feel incredibly self-confident.
sentences.cn: 个子高会使你感觉极其自信。

sentences.en: Despite her disability, Philippa is very confident.
sentences.cn: 菲莉帕虽然有残疾，却很自信。

sentences.en: He has a lively sense of humour and appears naturally confident.
sentences.cn: 他有一种活泼外向的幽默感，看上去大方自信。

sentences.en: He is confident the backroom can step into the temporary void.
sentences.cn: 他确信原先的幕后智囊能够填补暂时的空缺。

sentences.en: He was confident the allies would make good on their pledges.
sentences.cn: 他相信盟友们会履行他们的承诺。

sentences.en: He's very forward and confident and chats happily to other people.
sentences.cn: 他很自以为是，喜欢和别人攀谈。

sentences.en: Her drama teacher is confident Julie is a star in the making.
sentences.cn: 朱莉的戏剧老师相信她会成为一颗冉冉升起的明星。

sentences.en: I admired him for being so confident at his age.
sentences.cn: 我钦佩他这般年纪就如此自信。

sentences.en: I think people feel a bit more confident.
sentences.cn: 我想人们应该觉得稍微自信了一点儿。

sentences.en: If there has to be a replay we are confident of victory.
sentences.cn: 如果重新比赛，我们有信心取得胜利。

sentences.en: Management is confident about the way business is progressing.
sentences.cn: 管理层对业务发展的态势充满信心。

sentences.en: Marina was a confident, happy child.
sentences.cn: 玛丽娜是个自信、快乐的孩子。

sentences.en: Mr Ryan is confident of success.
sentences.cn: 瑞安先生坚信一定会成功。

sentences.en: Nigel Deering, the publisher, is quietly confident about the magazine's chances.
sentences.cn: 出版商奈杰尔·迪林心中对这份杂志的成功很有把握。

sentences.en: Police say they are confident of catching the gunman.
sentences.cn: 警方说他们有信心抓住那个持枪歹徒。

sentences.en: She is a confident woman who is certain of her views.
sentences.cn: 她是一位充满自信的女性，对自己的观点深信不疑。

sentences.en: We are confident next year’s profits will be higher.
sentences.cn: 我们确信明年的利润会增加。

words.tran_cn: 确信的;自信的;有信心的

trans.tran_en: sure that something will happen in the way that you want or expect
